ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###910-CSVMappingAutoCreate
ConfigItem.Description: Event module to add or change the CSV-mapping if config item class defintion is changed.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###ForceCSVMappingRecreation
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if CSV-mappings are re-created if already existent.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###CountMax
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the maximum number of each array attribute in CSV-mapping.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###EmptyFieldsLeaveTheOldValues
ConfigItem.Description: Defines whether empty fields should retain the old values during imports (option for CSV-mapping).

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###Charset
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which character should be used in CSV-mapping.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###ColumnSeparator
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which column separator should be used in CSV-mapping.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###IncludeColumnHeaders
ConfigItem.Description: Defines whether the column headings should be used for CSV-mapping.

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###DefaultIncidentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which default incident status should be used during imports (option for CSV-mapping).

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###DefaultDeploymentState
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which default deployment status should be used during imports (option for CSV-mapping).

ConfigItem.Name: ImportExport::CSVMappingAutoCreate###DefaultName
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which default name should be used during imports (option for CSV-mapping).
